column4: can somebody help me with Nvidia drivers? i try all what i can found on howtos... my log here http://rafb.net/paste/results/rYlC0G75.html
EE) NVIDIA(0): Failed to load the NVIDIA kernel module!
Sounds like you need to install the linux-restricted-modules package
if i use i686 kernel, it cant load modules for i386?
can you do a "aptitude search restricted-modules | grep -e '^i A'" ?
The error you're getting suggests the install you did didn't work somehow
still no guarantee you have that package installed ..
i try "aptitude install linux-restricted-modules-2.6.17-10", but not found this
